toc_entry.title: Good-Bye, Kenny Rogers, Hello, Wagoneers
toc_entry.description: When it’s hot, it’s hot! And country music is hot tonight at your nearest dance hall, beer joint, or record store.

toc_entry.title: The Fall Of Country ... The Rise Of Country
toc_entry.description: As Nashville pandered to the lowest common denominator, Texans found a new audience hungry for old traditions.

toc_entry.title: One Brick Shy Of A Load
toc_entry.description: Not your run-of-the-mill pickers and singers, these performers are determined to carve out new territory.

toc_entry.title: Worked To Death
toc_entry.description: The allure of Galveston Bay is not natural beauty but the determination of nature to survive ugliness.

toc_entry.title: It’s the Way We’Ve ALWayS Done It, Sir
toc_entry.description: How the Pentagon really works, as told by a Texan who tried to make it work a little differently....

toc_entry.title: Tempest In A Taco
toc_entry.description: Taco Cabana pioneered patio dining—a winning formula of Tex-Mex food and margaritas in the open air. When competitor Two Pesos introduced its look-alike layout, the lawsuits started to fly.

toc_entry.title: Football Hand Signals
toc_entry.subtitle: Texas Primer
toc_entry.description: From “Hook ’em, Horns” to “Peck ’em, Owls,” the Southwest Conference is football’s most hospitable habitat for hand jive.

toc_entry.subtitle: Food
toc_entry.description: Thanks to adventurous chef Michel Bernard Platz, the flowers at Dallas’ L’Entrecote are as likely to be on the menu as in a vase...

toc_entry.title: The Old West, the New South
toc_entry.subtitle: Books
toc_entry.description: In Anything for Billy, Larry McMurtry trounces the Western myth; Frederick Barthelme, in Two Against One, casts a cold eye on a self-destructing marriage.

toc_entry.description: After learning that he had cancer, the author began a search for a cure that took him far beyond medical expertise.

toc_entry.title: The Roar Of the Crowd

toc_entry.title: Around the State
toc_entry.description: A selective guide to amusements and events.

toc_entry.description: Corpus Christi learns to grow through adversity; Houston gives Percy Foreman a rousing send-off; Austin ponders the mystery of the misappearing shoes..

toc_entry.description: It’s beef against chicken in the war of weights; Republicans give a key energy appointment to a Texas Democrat; does Bush or Bentsen have coattails?
